content:
TITLE: Adding Data and Layout Settings for Root and Axis Components
DESCRIPTION: This snippet details new configuration options such as 'timezone' for `Root`, 'addBOM' for CSV export, and methods like `remove`, `disable`, `enable` for adapters. It introduces `GaplessDateAxis` for continuous time scales, and supports timezone adjustments in charts, facilitating more flexible data visualization and export options.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Added `timezone` setting to `Root`. 
`addBOM` option for CSV export.
Methods `remove(key)`, `disable(key)`, `enable(key)` for adapters.
Introduced `GaplessDateAxis` to remove empty data intervals.
Support for timezone in root configuration.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Enhancing Chart Interactivity and Series Management
DESCRIPTION: This section introduces new features enabling advanced interaction, such as adding `remove(key)` method to adapters, exporting default themes, exposing TypeScript settings interfaces, creating a `Modal` class, and enabling `reverseChildren`. It enhances chart configurability, data management, and layout control, supported by underlying series, theme, and container classes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Added `remove(key)` method to adapters.
Default themes exported as `DefaultTheme` for each chart type.
Types for settings interfaces exposed via re-exports.
Created `am5.Modal` class.
`Container` setting `reverseChildren` for RTL layouts.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Enhanced Capabilities for Export, Theming, and Data Grouping
DESCRIPTION: Features include new series settings for `groupDataDisabled`, plugin `SliceGrouper` for slice grouping in percent charts, and fixes for color assignment, escape sequences, data updates, label arrangements, and interaction bugs in touch devices. These enhancements facilitate better data presentation and user interaction.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Added `groupDataDisabled` to XYSeries.
Implemented `SliceGrouper` plugin for slice grouping.
Fixed color assignment on dynamic data.
Corrected escaping of brackets and apostrophes.
Fixed label arrangement for PieSeries.
Improved touch interaction on XYCursor after zoom.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Tools and Properties to Axes and Cursors in amCharts5
DESCRIPTION: This snippet details the introduction of new properties such as 'affectsMinMax' for value axes, 'segments' for Line series, 'tooltipIntervalOffset' and 'tooltipDateFormats' for DateAxis, and 'syncWith' for XYCursor. These enhancements improve tooltip precision, appearance, and cursor synchronization in XY charts. They depend on existing axis and cursor classes and are used to customize chart interactivity and data presentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
affectsMinMax` added to value axis range.
segments` property added to `Line` class for multiple segments.
tooltipIntervalOffset` setting for `DateAxis` to round tooltip values.
tooltipDateFormats` for custom date formats in tooltips.
syncWith` setting in `XYCursor` for cursor synchronization.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: MapPointSeries latitudeField and longitudeField - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for adding geographical coordinates to MapPointSeries.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_30

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
MapPointSeries: {
  latitudeField: string;
  longitudeField: string;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Root autoResize property and resize method - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration to disable automatic resizing of the chart and a method to manually resize the chart.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_35

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Root: {
  autoResize: boolean;
  resize(): void;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: AxisRenderer pan property - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration of the pan behavior on AxisRendererX and AxisRendererY, enabling zooming of the axis scale by dragging.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_33

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
AxisRendererX: {
  pan: "none" | "zoom";
}
AxisRendererY: {
  pan: "none" | "zoom";
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: XYChart wheel event configuration - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for handling wheel events on XYChart, allowing to prevent wheelable default behaviour.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_29

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
XYChart: {
  wheelX: number;
  wheelY: number;
  wheelable: boolean;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding tooltipContainerBounds to Root for margin configuration
DESCRIPTION: Introduces the tooltipContainerBounds setting to the Root component, allowing developers to define margins and boundaries for tooltips to extend outside the chart area. This enhances tooltip placement flexibility and visual integration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
/* No specific code provided, only description of added feature */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: XYSeries tooltipPosition configuration - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for tooltip positioning on XYSeries, setting tooltip anchor point.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_23

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
tooltipPositionX: "value" | "open" | "low" | "high";
tooltipPositionY: "value" | "open" | "low" | "high";
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sprite showTooltipOn configuration - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration to control when a tooltip is shown on a Sprite, with options for hover or always displaying the tooltip.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_25

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
showTooltipOn: "hover" | "always";
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding lineType option to MapLineSeries for line customization
DESCRIPTION: Provides the ability to set individual line types ('curved' or 'straight') for each MapLineDataItem, with 'curved' as default for naturally flowing paths based on projections. This depends on MapLineSeries and enhances visual representation of map lines without crossing longitude boundaries.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
/* No specific code provided, only description of added feature */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Legend clickTarget configuration - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration to define the target for click events on a Legend item, allowing disabling of item toggling.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_28

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Legend: {
  clickTarget: "itemContainer" | "marker" | "none";
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sprite rightclick and middleclick events - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: New events for handling right-click and middle-click interactions on a Sprite.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_37

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Sprite: {
  on("rightclick", function() {});
  on("middleclick", function() {});
}
```

TITLE: Adding fillOpacity property to Label in amCharts5
DESCRIPTION: Introduces the fillOpacity setting to the Label component, enabling transparency adjustments for label backgrounds. This feature depends on the existing Label class and requires amCharts5 environment. It allows developers to make labels more visually integrated with underlying charts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: JavaScript

```

```

DESCRIPTION: Introduces affectsBounds setting for MapSeries, controlling whether individual map components like MapPointSeries or MapLineSeries influence the overall chart bounds, facilitating customized map rendering.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: JavaScript


TITLE: Implementing clipExtent in GraticuleSeries for boundary clipping
DESCRIPTION: Adds a clipExtent option to the GraticuleSeries, enabling drawing the graticule only within specified polygon bounds when set to true. This improves rendering performance and visual clarity when working with complex map overlays and dependencies on MapSeries.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
/* No specific code provided, only description of added feature */
```

TITLE: Label fontDecoration underline - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for enabling underlined text on a Label using fontDecoration property or inline style.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_26

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Label: {
  fontDecoration: "underline";
}

"[underline]text"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Enabling stacked bullets in AxisBullet for multi-item axis
DESCRIPTION: Adds a 'stacked' property to AxisBullet, allowing bullets to be positioned on top of each other when multiple data items are associated with the same category, improving readability in categorical axes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
/* No code snippet provided, only feature description */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: XYCursor maxTooltipDistance configuration - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for the maximum distance to display a single tooltip in XYCursor, with the option to display only one tooltip.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_32

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
XYCursor: {
  maxTooltipDistance: number;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: XYCursor snapToSeriesBy configuration - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration to define the direction for snapping to the nearest data item in XYCursor.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_38

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
XYCursor: {
  snapToSeriesBy: "xy" | "x" | "y";
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sprite accessibility settings - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Accessibility settings for Sprites, including ariaControls, ariaValueMin, and ariaValueMax.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_27

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Sprite: {
  ariaControls: string;
  ariaValueMin: number;
  ariaValueMax: number;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sprite focusableGroup accessibility setting - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for grouping focusable elements within a Sprite for improved accessibility navigation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_34

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Sprite: {
  focusableGroup: boolean;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Default Tooltip Formats for DateAxis in amCharts5
DESCRIPTION: This code updates the default tooltip date formats used by 'DateAxis' in amCharts5, now prioritizing newly introduced 'tooltipDateFormats' setting over existing 'dateFormats'. This change enhances customization of tooltip date presentation in time-based axes, depending on user-defined or default formats. It relies on the chart's date axis configuration and the availability of 'tooltipDateFormats'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Default tooltip date formats have changed slightly for `DateAxis`. Previously, it was using formats from `dateFormats`. Now it uses defaults/user values from newly-introduced `tooltipDateFormats` setting.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding backgroundOpacity to Exporting settings
DESCRIPTION: Adds a backgroundOpacity property to the Exporting module, allowing control over the transparency of exported images' background, for better visual styling of exported assets.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
/* No code snippet provided, only feature addition description */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Root moveDOM method - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Method for moving the chart's DOM element to a different container within the DOM.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_39

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Root: {
  moveDOM(elementId: string | HTMLElement): void;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Global am5.ready function - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Global function that executes a provided function when the DOM is ready.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_41

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
am5.ready(function() {});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Root fps property - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Configuration of the maximum frames per second (FPS) for the Root element, useful for performance optimization.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_31

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Root: {
  fps: number;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Global am5.p0 function - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Global function to easily get a Percent(0) object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_36

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
am5.p0()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Exporting duration formatting settings - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Settings for formatting durations within the exporting module, enabling customization of duration fields, format, and unit.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_24

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Exporting: {
  durationFields: string[];
  durationFormat: string;
  durationUnit: string;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RadialLabel radius and baseRadius methods - amCharts 5
DESCRIPTION: Methods to retrieve the calculated radius and baseRadius values of a RadialLabel in pixels.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_40

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
RadialLabel: {
  radius(): number;
  baseRadius(): number;
}
```

TITLE: Refining chart resizing logic and event dispatching
DESCRIPTION: Addresses issues with chart resizing, including proper event dispatching from sprites when bounds or settings change, ensuring dynamic updates are accurately reflected.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
/* No code snippet provided, only fix description */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Refining Label Wrapping, Memory Management, and Layout in amCharts5
DESCRIPTION: Code updates improve label auto-wrapping algorithms, auto-hiding scrollbars, and fixing layout issues with percentages, min/max dimensions, and small slices. It also addresses memory leaks and proper clipping of bullets, ensuring more accurate and efficient rendering across devices.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_19

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Adjusted label wrapping to avoid wrapping on dots.
Scrollbar auto-hide improves UX.
Fixed layout issues with percentage sizes.
Corrected rendering of small slices with corner radius.
Addressed clipping and memory leak issues.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Enhancing Chart Layout Responsiveness and Clipping in amCharts5
DESCRIPTION: This update improves label wrapping behavior, ensures scrollbars auto-hide appropriately, and fixes tooltip rendering issues with shadow DOM. It also enhances layout algorithms for category axes and improves clipping of chart bullets, contributing to overall chart performance and appearance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_21

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Improved label auto-wrapping to prevent fractional wraps.
Scrollbar auto-hide feature added.
Fixed tooltip rendering inside shadow DOM.
Enhanced placement for category axis labels and grid.
Corrected bullet clipping in plot areas.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Improving Chart Layout and Data Handling Stability
DESCRIPTION: This code addresses bugs related to axis range clearing, arc rendering with negative corners, data grouping controls, axis header positioning, and overall rendering speed. It also moves settings related to high/low data to `XYSeries` for coherent management, enhancing chart responsiveness and visual consistency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Fixed axis range clearing.
Corrected `cornerRadius` handling for negative arcs.
Adjusted `groupDataDisabled` on `XYSeries`.
Ensured axis headers update position correctly.
Optimized chart disposal performance.
Fixed stacking issues with zero-value series.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Fixing Visual and Interaction Bugs in amCharts5 Versions
DESCRIPTION: This snippet describes bug fixes addressing issues like stacking overflow in 'DurationAxis', missing axis backgrounds, performance improvements for stacked series with nulls, and mouse position fixing during transforms. These fixes depend on internal rendering logic and interaction handling, improving chart stability and user experience.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Fixed issues with stacking `DurationAxis` with 'second' duration.
Background on `ValueAxis` now shows properly.
Performance improvements for charts with many null series.
Corrected mouse position calculations during transformations.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Resolving Chart Rendering and Data Handling Issues in amCharts5
DESCRIPTION: Fixes include proper hiding of `XYCursor`, correct label positioning, trimming whitespace on wrapped labels, proper state behavior in `ColumnSeries`, display of emojis on circular labels, and optimized disposal of chart elements. These improvements ensure correct visual rendering and interaction consistency across different devices and configurations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Fixed `XYCursor` not hiding on position change.
Corrected label placement and whitespace trimming.
Fixed `dropFromPrevious` and `riseFromPrevious` states.
Ensured proper emoji display on circular labels.
Optimized cleanup of chart `<canvas>` elements.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Fixing Slicing and Layout Bugs in amCharts5
DESCRIPTION: The final set of fixes involve proper handling of `WordCloud` coloring, escaping, data updates, and label arrangements, as well as ensuring consistent interaction behaviors on all devices. These adjustments focus on stability and visual accuracy in complex visualizations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_22

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Fixed `WordCloud` coloring when all words share the same weight.
Corrected escaping of brackets and apostrophes.
Fixed data update handling.
Improved label placement and interaction consistency.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Resolving Word Cloud and UI Interaction Bugs in amCharts5
DESCRIPTION: This snippet fixes coloring issues in WordCloud if all words share the same weight, adds `type` and `main` in `package.json`, and corrects scrollbar behavior in non-animated themes. These fixes improve visual consistency and package management.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/packages/shared/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_20

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
Fixed WordCloud coloring when all words have same weight.
Added `type` and `main` fields to `package.json`.
Corrected scrollbar behavior in non-animated themes.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing dependencies using Yarn
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the necessary dependencies for the amCharts 5 project using the Yarn package manager. It reads the project's package.json file and downloads the listed dependencies into the node_modules directory. This step is required before building or running the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building geodata using Yarn
DESCRIPTION: This command builds the geodata components for the amCharts 5 project using the Yarn package manager. It likely involves processing and converting geographical data into a format suitable for use with amCharts 5 maps.  This step is needed to create geodata files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn build:geodata
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building ES2015 modules using Yarn
DESCRIPTION: This command builds the amCharts 5 project into ES2015 modules using the Yarn package manager. It likely uses a build script defined in the package.json file to transpile the source code and generate the ES2015 module files. This is one of the build targets for the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building script version using Yarn
DESCRIPTION: This command builds a script version of the amCharts 5 project using Yarn. It likely utilizes a build script specified in package.json to generate a single JavaScript file suitable for direct inclusion in HTML pages. This provides a pre-compiled version for browser usage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/amcharts/amcharts5/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn build:script
```
